title: Random Signals & Appl
description: Introduction to random signals and processes with emphasis on applications in ECE.  Includes basic estimation theory, linear prediction, and statistical modeling.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: ECE 3084 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C and (ECE 3077 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ISYE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 3670 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CEE 3770 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
